select
example.distinct
from MERCHANT
order by ${example.orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update MERCHANT
INST_ID = #{record.instId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MRCHNO = #{record.mrchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_OFFICE = #{record.headOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADING_AS = #{record.tradingAs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS1 = #{record.address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS2 = #{record.address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{record.postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRYCODE = #{record.countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_ADDRESS1 = #{record.phyAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_ADDRESS2 = #{record.phyAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_CITY = #{record.phyCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_STATE = #{record.phyState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_POSTCODE = #{record.phyPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHY_COUNTRYCODE = #{record.phyCountrycode,jdbcType=CHAR},
REG_ADDRESS1 = #{record.regAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_ADDRESS2 = #{record.regAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CITY = #{record.regCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_STATE = #{record.regState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_POSTCODE = #{record.regPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_COUNTRYCODE = #{record.regCountrycode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CURRCODE = #{record.currcode,jdbcType=CHAR},

ACPTBUS = #{record.acptbus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTACT1 = #{record.contact1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT2 = #{record.contact2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT3 = #{record.contact3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELNO1 = #{record.telno1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELNO2 = #{record.telno2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELNO3 = #{record.telno3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAXNO = #{record.faxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEX = #{record.telex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORTCODE = #{record.sortcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRNCODE = #{record.brncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCNO = #{record.accno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCNM = #{record.accnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXCODE = #{record.taxcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
STMTFREQ = #{record.stmtfreq,jdbcType=CHAR},
STMTTO = #{record.stmtto,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STMTTO_HO = #{record.stmttoHo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYMTYPE = #{record.paymtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAYMTO = #{record.paymto,jdbcType=CHAR},
POSFLAG = #{record.posflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
VIPFLAG = #{record.vipflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSC_CHARGE = #{record.mscCharge,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSC_CALC = #{record.mscCalc,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSC_TABLE = #{record.mscTable,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MSC = #{record.msc,jdbcType=FLOAT},
CONTRNO = #{record.contrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRDATE = #{record.contrdate,jdbcType=DATE},
CONTRCNX = #{record.contrcnx,jdbcType=DATE},
CONTRSIGN = #{record.contrsign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICIAL = #{record.official,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MRCHSTAT = #{record.mrchstat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RNC = #{record.rnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXREG = #{record.taxreg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETENAMT = #{record.retenamt,jdbcType=FLOAT},

USRDATA2 = #{record.usrdata2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ALLOWINST = #{record.allowinst,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PPPYMNTATTR = #{record.pppymntattr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERNO_CTX = #{record.vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
